messages.title: RESIDENTS' FEEDBACK
messages.content: As your Member of Parliament, I receive many emails and letters from residents who need help or advice, and I hold regular advice surgeries and 'Meet your MP' events in and around the constituency.

issues.economy: Recently, the recession has left many people worse off.
issues.governance: Local services are under strain, often because of the way our rural communities do not get a fair deal from the government.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your MP, I care deeply for the wellbeing of our communities and I am determined to champion them through difficult times. Please help me to represent your concerns in the House of Commons by completing and returning this survey.

images.caption: Geoffrey Cox MP with constituents and in the House of Commons.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This survey is being conducted at no expense to the taxpayer. Your response will remain confidential and your privacy will be respected.
